Namespace: ajax

ajax

Source:
  • ajax.js, line 1

Methods

(static) ajax(options) → {Promise}

Performs and AJAX request based on options you pass you. Your options must at least have a url.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
options object Request options like { url, headers, method };
Source:
  • ajax.js, line 37
Returns:
- A ES6 Promise that resolves or rejects when the request comes back
Type
Promise
Example
var ajaxOptions = { 
   url: '/_api/web/contentTypes', 
   method: "GET", 
   headers: { Accept: "application/json;odata=verbose" } 
};
SPScript.utils.ajax(ajaxOptions)
		.then(SPScript.utils.parseJSON)
		.then(function(data){ console.log(data.d.results) })
		.catch(function(error) { console.log(error)})
